definition: weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

sentences.english: The low-density parity-check codes constructed by the proposed method have a good structure.
sentences.chinese: 採用這一方法構造的低密度校驗碼具有良好的結構。

sentences.english: Hamming code, a checksum error code set.
sentences.chinese: 漢明碼，一個錯誤校驗碼碼集。

sentences.english: The calculation of CRC calibration code was also introduced.
sentences.chinese: 並介紹了CRC校驗碼的計算方法。
